      • About Course

      Course Title: Building a Portfolio Website (Hindi)

      In today’s digital age, having a strong online presence is crucial, especially for professionals looking to showcase their work and stand out in their field. This course will teach you how to create a professional and visually appealing portfolio website to showcase your work and skills.

      You will start by learning the fundamentals of web development, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. You will also learn how to use popular web development frameworks like Bootstrap to create responsive and mobile-friendly websites. You will then move on to creating a portfolio website from scratch, starting with designing the layout and selecting the color scheme.

      Throughout the course, you will learn how to create engaging and interactive user experiences using animations, transitions, and other web design techniques. You will also learn how to optimize your website for search engines and create an engaging portfolio that highlights your strengths and accomplishments.

      By the end of this course, you will have a fully functional portfolio website that showcases your work and skills in a professional and visually appealing way. You will also have the knowledge and skills to continue developing your website and adding new content as your career progresses.

      Course Objectives:

      • Learn the fundamentals of web development, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
      • Understand how to use popular web development frameworks like Bootstrap to create responsive and mobile-friendly websites
      • Design a visually appealing layout and color scheme for your portfolio website
      • Create engaging and interactive user experiences using animations, transitions, and other web design techniques
      • Optimize your website for search engines and create an engaging portfolio that highlights your strengths and accomplishments
      • Develop a fully functional portfolio website that showcases your work and skills in a professional and visually appealing way.
